chapters.title: Chapter 23: Ornaments
chapters.info: Beldeine Nyram, p. 532 (643)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She has no Warders, which is extremely unusual for a Green. She was raised to the shawl about three years ago, and as yet is too new to the shawl to have the ageless look. She was captured at Dumai's Wells and is now a prisoner of the Aiel. According to Min's viewing of her, she will bond one of the Asha'man as a Warder. She was pretty, and has high cheekbones and slightly tilted brown eyes.
